welcome_message_body: Welcome to Redlands, a charming city known for its historic downtown, beautiful citrus groves, and scenic views. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities such as restaurants, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
